comments:
I20060328-0010

While searching through my workspace I got the error message shown in the attachment (Resource is out of sync). The message is not only shown in an error dialog but also written to the log. The error dialog would be enough.

Created an attachment (id=37058)
dialog

Also the label is super long and the dialog does not wrap it.

We always show dialogs and write at the log. Otherwise the problems get lost.

But you're rigth, the error message should be wrapped. Moving to platform.
changing prio and status per platform ui bug guidelines
